Hey There, I'm Smart.

Front-end Web Developer and UI/UX Designer

My Works

My main Procedures before developing a frontend program

  • Create Wireframe for the project
  • Check out similar design patterns for it
  • Choose a Color Theme for the program
  • Understand who will use the program and what their main objectives will be
